website_summaries.verdict: Silky serum delivers hydration as well as high-definition optics to counteract imperfections and brighten up the skin.
pros: Super smooth with a handy applicator, which makes it perfect for targeting flaws and dotting and blending along under-eye shadows
Works especially well on dry and mature skin
A little goes a long way
cons: Not as good on oily skin, and the color is not opaque enough for deep coverage

customer_reviews.title: I purchased this concealer hoping it would work better than others I've tried
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this concealer hoping it would work better than others I've tried. It exceeded my expectations! Because I don't wear foundation so most concealers don't blend in well even though I wear a moisturizer. Bareskin Concealer blends well and looks natural. Doesn't totally cover but I'm ok with that because it looks so natural on my skin. Will definitely be reordering this!
customer_reviews.author: Melanie

customer_reviews.title: Very good concealer for older woman
customer_reviews.text: i really like this concealer! I am in my 60's, and I can wear it and it doesn't cause lines or an older look. Very natural. And I've found that a little goes a long way. I would definitely buy again!
customer_reviews.author: Diane Simmons

customer_reviews.title: Terrible Concealer
customer_reviews.text: This is really the most useless concealer. I used to use the powder bareMinerals concealer and it was great. This one is just SHINY. Sure, if you look at the mirror straight on it looks concealed. But any other angle it seems to draw attention to your problem areas. What is the point if it only works from one angle?
customer_reviews.author: katelynicole

customer_reviews.title: Excellent concealer!
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely love this concealer! I have an issue with dark circles and this covers them so very well! My only little issue is that the product is a little messy, like it gets all over the tube which is a tad wasteful. But I do highly recommend this!
customer_reviews.author: Angela D Glover

customer_reviews.title: Not really made by Bareminerals!
customer_reviews.text: Fake product, do not buy. Not actually made by bareminerals, false advertising and product sucks. Would give it zero stars if possible, returning immediately.
customer_reviews.author: Chloe Michelle Rapp

customer_reviews.title: Love it! Would buy again
customer_reviews.text: Love this! I bought it again from the bare minerals website, to ensure I got an authentic product and they are identical so rest assured it’s the real deal. I find it covers better than a “stick” foundation or concealer. Doesn’t break me out. Actually matches my yellow but pale skin tone which is hard to do. Not too thin or thick and blends super easily, very lightweight doesn’t leave any residual “feeling”. Would definitely re purchase!
customer_reviews.author: JBElle

customer_reviews.title: Highly recommend!!!
customer_reviews.text: I LOVE this product and have bought it again and again! I can use it for under eyes and blemishes under foundation or just by itself (spot treatment) with a little blush and lipstick. My extremely sensitive skin actually tolerates this product too which is very rare.
customer_reviews.author: Rene Pemerton

customer_reviews.title: Great feeling with added serum.
customer_reviews.text: Love how this feels on. Double bonus with the serum although you may give up some coverage. All in all, I’m not disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Bella

customer_reviews.title: Amazing product!
customer_reviews.text: I looooove this concealer. It is so nice and light on the face without skimping on coverage! Gives my face a brightness and smoothness I have not found with so many other products, and the price was great!! Thank you BareMinerals for a great product!!
customer_reviews.author: Sarah Menzer

customer_reviews.title: Got wrong product
customer_reviews.text: Pretty sure I got the wrong product. I received a powder and was expecting a liquid concealer
customer_reviews.author: Paige

customer_reviews.title: okay
customer_reviews.text: okay coverage, light. not cakey. overpriced for size and coverage
customer_reviews.author: B

customer_reviews.title: So happy!!
customer_reviews.text: I love how flawlessly this covers! I have skin discolorations, flaws and wrinkles and this covers and blends so well!
customer_reviews.author: Ariadneo

customer_reviews.title: Great Coverage
customer_reviews.text: Love this concealer. It covers my redness and blotches like a champ.
customer_reviews.author: Cortney B Debski

customer_reviews.title: Only Makeup I Buy!
customer_reviews.text: Bare Escentuals always makes premium makeup. It's the only one I use and recommend to everyone.
customer_reviews.author: Michelle T

customer_reviews.title: Best under concealer ever !
customer_reviews.text: I love this concealer I have ever tried and I have used many over the years. It is silky and it only takes a little to hide darkness under eyes easily. Color match is great too!
customer_reviews.author: Dawg

customer_reviews.title: Works great
customer_reviews.text: This concealer works great for me..I use it as an eyeshadow primer and my eyeshadow stays put for over 12 hours. I use it under my eyes as well.
customer_reviews.author: MARTY

customer_reviews.title: The best concealer forever
customer_reviews.text: I’ve used this for years it’s perfect. I’m able to even wear it without foundation in the summer time. Doesn’t look cakey at all.
customer_reviews.author: Alyssa Jauregui

customer_reviews.title: Good coverage, poor setting
customer_reviews.text: Loved the product but it is too wet and doesn’t set well with finishing powder.
customer_reviews.author: Amanda Miller

customer_reviews.title: FAKE
customer_reviews.text: Fake, conterfeit. If you want to break out, go for it. I just spent twice as much on Dermablend because Amazon is a certified seller for it; just check the small print. Wish same could be said for this product.
customer_reviews.author: Rachel

customer_reviews.title: Perfect!
customer_reviews.text: Amazing coverage. Very creamy consistency. I love this concealer so much! A friends of mine had been using this same concealer and told me to try it out and it was so perfect!
customer_reviews.author: Bailey

customer_reviews.title: New Favorite
customer_reviews.text: This is by far my favorite concealer I have ever used! I will definitely order again!
customer_reviews.author: Morgan

customer_reviews.title: Awesome concealer
customer_reviews.text: This makeup product is perfect. I don’t like heavy things on my face and this helps with that. The concealer also blends really well. Very impressed.
customer_reviews.author: Rylie

customer_reviews.title: Best
customer_reviews.text: This concealer is great! The products goes on very smooth and does not cake up like most concealers.
customer_reviews.author: Jackie Sowards

customer_reviews.title: Good coverage
customer_reviews.text: This gives good coverage without feeling heavy or painted over.
customer_reviews.author: Twins Rock

customer_reviews.title: Don’t leave home without it!
customer_reviews.text: In an era where tons of makeup companies are popping up on Instagram and simple tests can match your skin tone, just go with the one you can always count on!
customer_reviews.author: CCStJohn

customer_reviews.title: Product
customer_reviews.text: I’m sure the product is great, and I’ve used it before. Would be helpful if the right item was sent. 2 Times got the wrong item.
customer_reviews.author: Laura Grier

customer_reviews.title: A Favorite Product
customer_reviews.text: My daily makeup regime isn't complete without my Bareskin Concealer!
customer_reviews.author: Lynne Irvine

customer_reviews.title: Great!
customer_reviews.text: I have been recently pulling all nighters at work, and been a victim of large bags under my eyes. This product covers everything and lasts.
customer_reviews.author: Boss girl

customer_reviews.title: Not worth the money
customer_reviews.text: I put this on prior to the Bare Minerals foundation. The cover up made the foundation look cakey.
customer_reviews.author: Carrie Smith

customer_reviews.title: Exactly what I wanted from Ulta but CHEAPER!
customer_reviews.text: This is a must! exactly my brand I buy at Ulta but cheaper!
customer_reviews.author: Leah Piotter

customer_reviews.title: Didn’t last long
customer_reviews.text: Concealer generally lasts me about 2 months. This was gone after about 3 weeks
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: hides all flaws
customer_reviews.text: it is easy to apply . goes on smooth, does not fade.
customer_reviews.author: Lorraine Reiner

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: Love the coverage- tone is perfect and smooth, not greasy feel!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Works well not too thick
customer_reviews.text: I like the bare escentuals line and this has not disappointed either. I have the foundation but wanted something for acne spots and under my eyes. This does the job and has good coverage without being too thick and cakey.
customer_reviews.author: Chels

customer_reviews.title: I'm not so happy with this concealer
customer_reviews.text: I'm not so happy with this concealer. Too thick and difficult to work with. Coverage is minimal. Will give to daughter.
customer_reviews.author: Denise Weiss

customer_reviews.title: Great!
customer_reviews.text: This is the first time I have used bareMinerals. My daughter-in-law has used it a long time and suggested I try it. I'm very fair but this product does not wash me out. My face appears like I've never been in the sun. It is easy to apply so I don't have to spend lots of time in front of the mirror. And I don't have to reapply it constantly to keep the shine down. Thanks so much for this product.
customer_reviews.author: Maggie

customer_reviews.title: It works fine for the circles
customer_reviews.text: I only gave it 4 stars because I was hoping for a little more coverage. As I not only use it for dark circles, but also to try to cover a sun spot on my face. It works fine for the circles, but only ok on the spot.
customer_reviews.author: tokyo1979

customer_reviews.title: Fake Product!  Don't Buy!
customer_reviews.text: Different packaging, Chinese writing on box and concealer. Last one was called Bareskin and this one is called Bare? What's going on??? I'd like a refund.
customer_reviews.author: Goly

customer_reviews.title: Love this product,it's the best.
customer_reviews.text: I'm 65 and tried at least 20 different concealers in the last several years for my dark under eye circles,puffiness,and fine lines. This is the best ever, I look 20 years younger because this cream magicly covered my flaws. I used a few drops in dark or wrinkled areas and then used my facial Sponge to slightly blot it into the skin. Only takes a few minutes to apply. Doesn't cake ,smells good and goes on smooth.I love this product and would highly recommend this to anyone.I have an olive complected skin tone and used the light shade.This stuff is Amazing.
customer_reviews.author: Angela Graf

customer_reviews.title: Fabulous concealer...Blend Light and Medium
customer_reviews.text: After moisturizing the under eye area, I apply Light concealer to the dark inner eye circle of both eyes and blend it down the side of my nose. Then I gently pat Medium concealer over the entire under eye area. I finish with another dab of moisturizer to the entire under eye area. When it cakes (rarely), a quick swipe with a cotton swab does the trick. The tube is efficient.
customer_reviews.author: Jai

customer_reviews.title: Perfect
customer_reviews.text: Love this concealer. It's not sticky or gunky or runny. And it lasts a long time. This is the third time buying it. It also doesn't come running off when I sweat or workout, and doesn't cause me to breakout. Finding the right tone for my skin was hard at first though- is super pale but tan in the summer and spring so it took a bit of trial and error.
customer_reviews.author: Stacey

customer_reviews.title: Great for sensitive eyes
customer_reviews.text: I have used bare minerals for many years but never the concelaer. I needed something for under eyes that did not make my eyes water or melt away. This was perfect
customer_reviews.author: Tamara

customer_reviews.title: AMAZING PRODUCT for Dark Circles !!!!!!!
customer_reviews.text: I am 50! and this product is AMAZING!!!! I had it put on me at an Ulta store, and I never knew a concealer could do what this product does!!!! It truly gets rid of the dark circles and discolorations ALL DAY!!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Go to brand
customer_reviews.text: Love the feel of this on my skin feels conditioning as well as providing great coverage. Will be my go to now!
customer_reviews.author: Customer 2244

customer_reviews.title: Not for me
customer_reviews.text: Ewww, not for my skin. it's greasy and doesn't blend with my powder. Maybe I'm hust bad with applying make up.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: decent
customer_reviews.text: Wipes off easily. Takes forever to dry but hides dark circles fairly well
customer_reviews.author: vikpik

customer_reviews.title: Color is darker than expected
customer_reviews.text: This works well for my very oily skin. Be aware, the color is darker than expected. I usually wear bareminerals fairly medium in the powder, but this in fair is too dark.
customer_reviews.author: Lauren

customer_reviews.title: Messy applicator and leaks after closing
customer_reviews.text: Container leaked a lot after clising..messy. got on surrounding items in makeup bag.
customer_reviews.author: lizzie

customer_reviews.title: Great shade and great coverage
customer_reviews.text: Love the coverage and how it’s light weight Good deal on here for quality ingredients
customer_reviews.author: Eatingbrofood

customer_reviews.title: Good coverage
customer_reviews.text: Seems to provide good coverage but caused an allergic reaction around my eyes. Not for sensitive skin I guess.
customer_reviews.author: Edward A Ross

customer_reviews.title: We got this for my Mom and the difference between ...
customer_reviews.text: We got this for my Mom and the difference between her old product and this is noticeable. It blends into her skin so you can't see she is wearing any coverage.
customer_reviews.author: Utah Ellie

customer_reviews.title: Must have
customer_reviews.text: Love love love this concealer but like most concealer u have to bake the under eye and it stays in place all day.
customer_reviews.author: Teira

customer_reviews.title: Good but messy
customer_reviews.text: I like the color an how it looks on my face but the tube always leaks no matter what I do it just makes a mess.
customer_reviews.author: Pen Name

customer_reviews.title: Love it. And totally stays on if it gets ...
customer_reviews.text: Love it. And totally stays on if it gets a little wet. Just need to use a face wipe to take off, very easy. Tea color works perfectly with my dark brown hair.
customer_reviews.author: N. W.

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Very good at concealing age spots or blemishes. Easy to apply.
customer_reviews.author: Pam

customer_reviews.title: Love this stuff
customer_reviews.text: Love this stuff, I swear by it. My face has been free of breakouts since I've started using this too. I will always use this product! :)
customer_reviews.author: Lisa

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Not great on blemishes, a bit "chalkier" then expected, but a good color corrector.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Will buy again!
customer_reviews.text: Love this product used as under eye concealer; will buy again!
customer_reviews.author: MeadowMoonMarket

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Bare Minerals is the only makeup I will buy from now on!
customer_reviews.author: Debra Beasley

customer_reviews.title: I was excited to try this product after the reviews ...
customer_reviews.text: I was excited to try this product after the reviews said it didn't crease. Unfortunately for me it still creased and looked dry. The packaging leaked as well.
customer_reviews.author: ALISON B.

product_meta.title: bareMinerals Bareskin Complete Coverage Serum Light Concealer for Women, 0.2 Ounce
product_meta.description: A silky-smooth, complete coverage, concealer and serum formula. It instantly reduces the appearance of dark circles, discoloration, and other imperfections for a beautifully even-toned complexion. It provides younger looking skin.
feature_bullets: A silky-smooth, complete coverage, concealer and serum formula
It instantly reduces the appearance of dark circles, discoloration, and other imperfections for a beautifully even-toned complexion
Country of origin is United States
